entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:03 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 09:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -14.8°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
